00065 INT MOctalFADCPacketLoss_init()
00066 {
00067   // This histogram has the bank names labeled on the X-axis, and the midas
00068   // block number on the Y-axis.
00069   // This uses the TH1::kCanRebin mechanism to expand automatically to the
00070   // number of FADC banks.
00071   hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss = new TH1F(
00072     "hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss",
00073     "Number of FADC packets lost per board",
00074     4,128, 132);
00075   hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00076   hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00077   hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Packets Lost");
00078 
00079   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss = new TH1F(
00080     "hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss",
00081     "Number of MIDAS Events with FADC packet loss per board",
00082     4,128, 132);
00083   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00084   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00085   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of Events with lost packets");
00086 
00087   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLossPercent = new TH1F(
00088     "hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLossPercent",
00089     "Percentage of MIDAS Events with FADC packet loss per board",
00090     4,128, 132);
00091   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLossPercent->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00092   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLossPercent->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("FADC Board Number");
00093   hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLossPercent->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Average Number of Events with lost packets");
00094 
00095   return SUCCESS;
00096 }
00097 
00101 INT MOctalFADCPacketLoss_BOR(INT run_number)
00102 {
00103   midas_events = 1;
00104   
00105   return SUCCESS;
00106 }
00107 
00111 INT MOctalFADCPacketLoss(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00112 {
00113   // Get the event number
00114   int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00115 
00116   // Want the average and since I'll scale by 1/midas_event_number at the end, I should undo it now before I add the new data
00117   //if (midas_event_number > 1)
00118   //  hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss->Scale(midas_event_number-1);   
00119 
00120   unsigned int* raw; // Points at the raw data
00121   int bankSize = bk_locate(pevent,"NLSS",&raw);
00122 
00123   int board_number = 0;
00124   int packet_lost = 0;
00125   int n_packets_lost = 0;
00126 
00127   bool Boards[256]; // We can have maximally 256 FADC boards due to the address space
00128   for(int i=0; i<256; ++i) Boards[i] = false;
00129 
00130   for (int i = 0; i < bankSize; i+=2) {
00131     board_number = *(raw+i);
00132     packet_lost = *(raw+i+1);
00133     
00134     if(*(raw+i) >= 0 && *(raw+i) < 255) Boards[i] = true;
00135 
00136     n_packets_lost++;
00137     //    printf("Event #%d: Board %d lost packet #%d\n", midas_event_number, board_number, packet_lost);
00138 
00139     // Fill Diagnostic histogram
00140     hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss->Fill(board_number, 1);   
00141   }
00142 
00143   for(int i=0; i<256; ++i){
00144     if(Boards[i] == true){
00145       int bin = hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss->FindBin(i+1);
00146       hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss->Fill(bin);
00147       hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLossPercent->SetBinContent(bin, hNOctalFADCEventsWithPacketLoss->GetBinContent(bin) / midas_events);
00148     }
00149   }
00150   
00151   ++midas_events;
00152 
00153   // Scale down for the average, the final midas event should leave this correct
00154   //hNOctalFADCAvgPacketLoss->Scale(1.0 / midas_event_number);
00155 
00156   return SUCCESS;
00157 }
